name: Chat GPT
description: A plugin to query OpenAI's Chat GPT API in order to enhance existing streams or create new ones.

variables.name: Action
variables.description: Which action should the plugin perform?

variables.name: Interval
variables.description: Interval in seconds to perform the OpenAI call.

variables.name: Model
variables.description: The model used by the streams created by the plugin. It must fit the results returned by the OpenAI API.

variables.name: Prompt
variables.description: The question to ask the AI. You can use your stream's variables by using ${<FIELD>} in the prompt.

variables.name: Result is a JSON Object
variables.description: Should the OpenAI response be returned as a JSON Object? If yes your prompt MUST include the word JSON.

variables.name: Field
variables.description: The field that will be updated in your content object.

variables.name: Query (optional)
variables.description: You can perform dynamic query to pass additional data to your prompt by querying your OrbisDB instance. Results can be used in the prompt with ${query.results}.
